snippet: The Connecticut senior became the fourth woman to be unanimously chosen twice as a preseason Associated Press all-American.
abstract: University of Connecticut senior Breanna Stewart is seventh women's college basketball player to earn preseason Associated Press all-American honors three times, and fourth woman to be unanimously selected twice; other college basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Connecticut senior became the fourth woman to be unanimously chosen twice as a preseason Associated Press all-American.
